metadata.name: implements_op_swf_7
metadata.description: Comprehensive test for IMPLEMENTS_OP opcode (0x2C) - ActionScript implements keyword for interface support. Tests single interface, multiple interfaces, zero interfaces, and validates proper storage of interface metadata on constructor objects.

implementation_notes: ImplementsOp is fully implemented according to SWF specification
Stores interface list on constructor objects for use by instanceof and CastOp
Supports interface inheritance (interfaces extending other interfaces)
All supporting functions implemented: setInterfaceList(), implementsInterface(), getConstructor()
Object structure includes interface_count and interfaces fields
Memory management: proper reference counting for interface objects
notes: Full interface type checking will be available when instanceof opcode is fully implemented. ImplementsOp itself is complete - it properly stores interface metadata on constructors as specified.
